commit.message:
Simplify toString() implementations in Integer and Long classes

Replace conditional COMPACT_STRINGS checks with direct calls to
String.newStringWithLatin1Bytes() for better code clarity and
maintainability. This change affects:

- Integer.toString(int)
- Integer.toUnsignedString0(int, int)
- Long.toString(long)
- Long.toUnsignedString0(long, int)

The new approach leverages the existing String.newStringWithLatin1Bytes()
method which already handles the COMPACT_STRINGS logic internally.

Co-authored-by: Qwen-Coder <qwen-coder@alibabacloud.com>
